transbit.tbits.admin
Class AdminUtil

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          transbit.tbits.admin.AdminUtil
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class AdminUtil
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

This is an utility class that contains methods used by almost all the servlets in the webapps package.

Version:
: $Id: $
Author:

getRequestParams

public static java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getRequestParams(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest aRequest,
                                                                                      WebConfig aConfig,
                                                                                      int aPage)
                                                                               throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                                                                      TBitsException,
                                                                                      DatabaseException
This method parses the PathInfo of the HttpRequest object and extracts the required parameters based on the caller. URL Format: baseurl: url/ba fieldspage: url/ba/fieldname/fieldtype or url/ba/fieldname rolepage : url/ba/rolename managepage : url/ba/fieldname It can be also be in the following way: baseurl: url?q=ba fieldspage: url?q=ba/fieldname/fieldtype or url?q=ba/fieldname rolepage : url?q=ba/rolename managepage : url?q=ba/fieldname

Parameters:
aRequest - Http Request Object.
aConfig - UserConfig.
aPage - Caller of the function.
Returns:
Hashtable that contains the BA and Request Object based on the caller.
Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException - Thrown in case of servlet related errors.
TBitsException - of any application errors.
DatabaseException - Thrown in case of any database errors.
